description: Allows multiple inputs of text or numeric type on the same page.

displayResults.description: An array of objects with page IDs and display names to include in the results view.

displayIds.description: Array of IDs of response areas to include in this section.

items.description: Ids of response areas to include. Currently supported response areas are multipleInputResponseArea, textboxResponseArea, chaThreeDigit, likertResponseArea, chaAudiometryResultsPlot, chaAudiometryResultsTable, mpanlResponseArea, chaCalibrationCheck, and chaDPOAE.
